mapper.sql: id, zddd_date, place_origin_address, varit_name, yj_type, logistics_driver_tel, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag

mapper.update:
update ord_yj_info
zddd_date = #{zdddDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
place_origin_address = #{placeOriginAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
varit_name = #{varitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yj_type = #{yjType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_driver_tel = #{logisticsDriverTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ord_yj_info set zddd_date = #{zdddDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, place_origin_address = #{placeOriginAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, varit_name = #{varitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yj_type = #{yjType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logistics_driver_tel = #{logisticsDriverTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from ord_yj_info where del_flag = '0'
and logistics_driver_tel like CONCAT('%',#{logisticsDriverTel},'%')
and yj_type = #{yjType}
and place_origin_address like CONCAT('%',#{placeOriginAddress},'%')
order by create_date desc

select
from ord_yj_info where del_flag = '0' order by zddd_date desc
